metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20843 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In libexpat in Expat before 2.2.7, XML input including XML names that contain a large number of colons could make the XML parser consume a high amount of RAM and CPU resources while processing (enough to be usable for denial-of-service attacks).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20843` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.4
lib64expat1 - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.4
libexpat1 - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libxmltok1 - 1.2-3ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

libvtk-java - 5.10.1+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libvtk5.10 - 5.10.1+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libvtk5.10-qt4 - 5.10.1+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
python-vtk - 5.10.1+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
tcl-vtk - 5.10.1+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
vtk-examples - 5.10.1+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xmlparse.c doesn't appear to be built in the firefox package

criterions.comment: ayttm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

cadaver package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
coin3 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
expat package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.4').
insighttoolkit package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
libxmltok package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2-3ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm2').
matanza package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vnc4 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
vtk package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.10.1+dfsg-2.1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
xmlrpc-c package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
